overworld_structures.name: Village
overworld_structures.description: Settlement with villagers and various buildings
overworld_structures.special: Trading hub, can be raided by pillagers

overworld_structures.name: Pillager Outpost
overworld_structures.special: Defeating captain triggers Bad Omen effect

overworld_structures.name: Desert Temple
overworld_structures.description: Pyramid with hidden treasure room and TNT trap

overworld_structures.name: Jungle Temple
overworld_structures.description: Mossy cobblestone structure with puzzles and traps

overworld_structures.name: Woodland Mansion
overworld_structures.description: Massive dark oak structure with many rooms
overworld_structures.special: Very rare, contains Totem of Undying

overworld_structures.name: Mineshaft
overworld_structures.description: Abandoned underground mine with tunnels and rails

overworld_structures.name: Stronghold
overworld_structures.special: Contains End Portal to fight Ender Dragon

overworld_structures.name: Dungeon
overworld_structures.description: Small underground room with mob spawner

nether_structures.name: Nether Fortress
nether_structures.description: Large structure made of nether bricks
nether_structures.special: Only place to find Blazes and Nether Wart

nether_structures.name: Bastion Remnant
nether_structures.special: Lots of gold, dangerous Piglin Brutes

end_structures.name: End City
end_structures.description: Tall purple structures in The End
end_structures.special: Only source of Elytra (from End Ships)
